title: Get Auto Insurance Quote
description: A potential new customer wants a quote for auto insurance for their vehicle.

tasks.description: Gather personal information and vehicle details (make, model, year, VIN).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully collects all required customer and vehicle data.

tasks.description: Run a Motor Vehicle Report (MVR) to check the customer's driving record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the MVR and notes one speeding ticket from two years ago.

tasks.description: Present a quote with different coverage options (liability, collision, comprehensive) and pricing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, multi-option quote to the customer.
